channel.description:
A study in Suri and the people who disappoint her. (Also on Twitter @surisburnbook.)
How many books have you written, Kingston Rossdale? Oh, none? Mine is available wherever books are sold.
Email Suri at surisburnbook[at]gmail[dot]com
channel.title: Suri's Burn Book

item.title:
itskiernanshipka:
Thanks for the gifts @adidasneolabel!!...
item.description:
itskiernanshipka:

Thanks for the gifts @adidasneolabel!! üíúüåºüéà

Dear Kiernan,

How are you out of doors, with a foot-push-not-a-bike, sneakers, and a beanie, and yet you look like you are staging the music video for ‚ÄúAmerica the Beautiful‚Äù?

item.title: And this is why you don‚Äôt let Tom Cruise cut your hair, no...
item.description: And this is why you don‚Äôt let Tom Cruise cut your hair, no matter how down in the dumps he seems or how excited he gets about bangs.

item.title: Harper Beckham wears jeans and doesn‚Äôt want people to know...
item.description: Harper Beckham wears jeans and doesn‚Äôt want people to know about it. Pass it on.

item.title: I don‚Äôt know how anyone can look this happy while wearing...
item.description: I don‚Äôt know how anyone can look this happy while wearing a school uniform that isn‚Äôt even properly tailored.

item.title: Oh, honey, no.
item.description: Oh, honey, no.

item.title: Meanwhile, Kiernan Shipka is actually too sophisticated for the...
item.description:
Meanwhile, Kiernan Shipka is actually too sophisticated for the Kids‚Äô Choice Awards, but she graced them with her presence in this casual, carefree look. If she‚Äôs wearing makeup, I can‚Äôt tell, and if she‚Äôs thinking to herself how much better she is than everyone else on this ‚Äúpurple carpet‚Äù (and I seriously hope that she is), I can‚Äôt tell that, either.

Best actress ever.

item.title: The thing is ‚Äî I, too, am too cool for the Kids‚Äô...
item.description:
The thing is ‚Äî I, too, am too cool for the Kids‚Äô Choice Awards. But you know what I do?

I don‚Äôt go to the Kids‚Äô Choice Awards.

item.title: Jessica Simpson sold clothes at a mall in North Carolina this...
item.description:
Jessica Simpson sold clothes at a mall in North Carolina this weekend (seriously), and Maxwell was there to help.

She looks almost as confused as I do. What is a ‚ÄúBelk‚Äù? What are these shoes with laces? Why did Jessica dress her in such non-colors? And can Ashlee breathe with her hair that tight?

item.title: Blue Ivy Carter was spotted in Brooklyn (haha) this weekend with...
item.description:
Blue Ivy Carter was spotted in Brooklyn (haha) this weekend with her mom, and oh my gosh look how tall she is! Look at her workboots. Look at her ability to exist that close to a public trash can without freaking out.

She‚Äôs not fooling me into thinking she‚Äôs tougher than me, though.

Okay, fine, she might be tougher than me.

item.title: Seraphina Affleck Got a Haircut, Everyone Weirdly Cares.
item.description:
Seraphina Affleck Got a Haircut, Everyone Weirdly Cares.:

Seraphina Affleck debuted a dramatic bob haircut this week. Unconfirmed reports suggest she cut her own hair, then had to have a professional attempt to fix it.

(The unconfirmed reports are from me, because it seems like something the Afflecks would do.)

item.title: The rumor going around today is that Kim and Kanye are...
item.description:
The rumor going around today is that Kim and Kanye are considering the baby name ‚ÄúNorth.‚Äù As in ‚ÄúNorth West.‚Äù For as dumb as these two are, I just can‚Äôt imagine they‚Äôd do something quite this dumb, and here‚Äôs why:

There is no way that Kim and Kanye aren‚Äôt going to give their baby a ‚Äúunique‚Äù (stupid) ‚Äúname‚Äù (word). Three words: search engine optimization.

item.title: Jessica Simpson tweeted this photo along with the caption,...
item.description: Jessica Simpson tweeted this photo along with the caption, ‚ÄúMaxwell has her momma‚Äôs pout down pat.‚Äù She also has her mother‚Äôs cheeks, affinity for leopard print, and weird hair choices. What is going on with that ponytail?

item.title: InTouch Magazine has the first photos of Holly Madison‚Äôs...
item.description:
InTouch Magazine has the first photos of Holly Madison‚Äôs baby Rainbow. I was expecting a much more exciting baby with a name like that.¬†

Holly also overshares some ridiculous details, such as,¬†‚ÄúEven the delivery was easy ‚Äî I was actually laughing as I was pushing!‚Äù

Best wishes, Rainbow.

item.title: Look who‚Äôs on the cover of Allure this month, telling the...
item.description:
Look who‚Äôs on the cover of Allure this month, telling the magazine that she‚Äôs ‚Äúopen to it‚Äù when asked if she wants more children.

Newsflash: I am not open to it.¬†

She did, however, tell Allure that she has nothing to do with my personal style, because I guess someone was still confused about that.

item.title: Yesterday was a holiday, which meant it was time for Mariah...
item.description: Yesterday was a holiday, which meant it was time for Mariah Carey to put costumes on her children and trot them out for a good Instagram! I‚Äôm sorry, Roc and Roe. This is your life. (Moroccan knows.)

item.title: The Duchess of Cambridge told a guy who told...
item.description:
The Duchess of Cambridge told a guy who told reporters,¬†‚ÄùI‚Äôd¬†like to have a boy and William would like a girl.‚Äù

That‚Äôs right, she wants a boy. I guess she finally figured out how difficult I can make things for her otherwise. Do not screw me on this, Kate.

item.title: This is Jewel and her family, spending a weekend reenacting...
item.description: This is Jewel and her family, spending a weekend reenacting scenes from the Oregon Trail. At least that‚Äôs what I assume they‚Äôre doing in these clothes.

item.title: Sally Draper, everybody. I honestly didn‚Äôt think anyone...
item.description: Sally Draper, everybody. I honestly didn‚Äôt think anyone could do classy boredom or headbands better than me.

item.title: I still don‚Äôt really know what to do with the fact that...
item.description: I still don‚Äôt really know what to do with the fact that Hilary Duff‚Äôs baby is basically perfect, even at pouting.

item.title: Okay, this is confusing. Shakira‚Äôs boyfriend/babyfather is...
item.description:
Okay, this is confusing. Shakira‚Äôs boyfriend/babyfather is a European football player for Barcelona. Barcelona has a rivalry with Milan, a team they beat spectacularly (or whatever spectacularly means when you‚Äôre talking about soccer) yesterday. Their baby, pictured here in his tiny jersey before the game, is named Milan, which makes rooting against your rival suddenly really awkward.

They should‚Äôve just gone ahead and named him Barcelona.
